East Gippsland

district forecast


Monday and Tuesday Scattered showers and possible thunder clearing overnight. Fine on Tuesday. A cool and mostly sunny day with light to moderate northwesterly winds.


Wednesday Fine. A cool day with light to moderate northwesterly winds.


Thursday Isolated showers developing, falling as snow above about 1000 metres later. Cool to cold.


Friday Scattered showers, falling as snow above about 900 metres. Local hail and thunder. Cold.

Issued Mon 15:31 EST
